secrets.name: API_KEY
secrets.label: Satosa API Key
secrets.description: The Satosa API Key to use for the integration

configuration.name: AUTH0_CUSTOM_DOMAIN
configuration.label: Auth0 Custom Domain
configuration.description: Only use this if you're using a custom domain with Auth0

configuration.name: CALLBACK_URL
configuration.label: Auth0 Domain
configuration.description: URL to redirect user after acknowledging the document

configuration.name: SATOSA_SERVICE_URL
configuration.label: Satosa Service URL
configuration.description: URL of for Satosa API requests

configuration.name: SATOSA_DOCUMENT_ID
configuration.label: Satosa Document ID
configuration.description: ID of for Satosa document you wish to collect acknowledgement for

configuration.name: SATOSA_HOSTED_URL
configuration.label: Satosa Hosted URL
configuration.description: URL where the document is hosted at
